author: Heather Anthony
comment: I love the look & logo. I just wish the watch hands were located on front layer instead of under the logo. Unable to see most of the time. Also wish the widget displayed fonts were larger, barely able to see steps taken.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Heather... Thanks for the review! You know there's a setting for text size in the "Extra" section ... its called "Global text" and you can select up to very large text size.

author: Jill and Brandon Gulker
comment: I couldn't get the app on my phone to adjust the settings (even following the intrusions provided). When I tried to open on my phone from the watch it just opened the play store screen which is not useful.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jill... if you send me a email i will reply to you with instructions Sir.

author: Kris Buchanan
comment: So I want my money back cause I can't even use this app. Nothing shows up on my phone or watch. So I'd like a refund ASAP

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris, Regarding Android wear 2.0 and my watchfaces ...install them on your phone, and then check the "apps on your phone" section of the Play Store on your watch.

author: Roman linley
comment: Crashes all the time on my lg urbaine annoying

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Roman.. you likely only need to reinstall it or restart your watch....

author: Lisa Feliciano
comment: not what i expected it to but its fine

author: eleni drizos
comment: Love my new face watch. After downloading on your phone u need to install it on ur watch in the app section !

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up eleni... you're exactly right!

author: Rob Mounts
comment: An absolutely beautiful watch face from an amazingly talented developer!! Takes me right back to the 70s TV show.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Rob... Thanks a lot Sir!

author: Darlena Griffith
comment: Love the watch, but heart monitor widget not showing anything

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up... thanks a lot for the feedback!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Heather... You surely are a AMAZING woman! Your positivism and support keep me going, i can't thank you enough.
